snippet: A mother and her three children have lived in shelters since a fire destroyed their home in December 2010, but they soldier on.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services helps single mother Kimberly Vaughn of the Bronx buy clothing for her family.
lead_paragraph: A mother and her three children have lived in shelters since a fire destroyed their home in December 2010, but they soldier on.
